result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
-24h@h now
index="_internal" user!="-" sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access "en-US/app" $dashboardName$ | rex field=uri "en-US/app/(?<app>[^/]+)/(?<dashboard>[^?/\s]+)" | search dashboard!="search" dashboard!="home" dashboard!="alert" dashboard!="lookup_edit" dashboard!="@go" dashboard!="data_lab" dashboard!="dataset" dashboard!="datasets" dashboard!="alerts" dashboard!="dashboards" dashboard!="reports" dashboard!="report" | table _time, host, user, app, dashboard $timeTok.earliest$ $timeTok.latest$
result.label: Splunk Dashboard Last Accessed
result.title: dashboard_last_accessed

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
index="_internal" user!="-" sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access "en-US/app" | rex field=uri "en-US/app/(?<app>[^/]+)/(?<dashboard>[^?/\s]+)" | search dashboard!="search" dashboard!="home" dashboard!="alert" dashboard!="lookup_edit" dashboard!="@go" dashboard!="data_lab" dashboard!="dataset" dashboard!="datasets" dashboard!="alerts" dashboard!="dashboards" dashboard!="reports" dashboard!="report" | table _time host app dashboard status uri_path user version $timepicker.earliest$ $timepicker.latest$
-24h@h now ALL * * app app | stats count by app ALL * * dashboard dashboard | stats count by dashboard ALL * * user user | stats count by user
Total Unique Dashboards used | search dashboard="$mydashboard$" app="$myapp$" user="$myuser$" | stats dc(count) as mycount by dashboard | stats count by mycount | table count Total Unique Users | search dashboard="$mydashboard$" app="$myapp$" user="$myuser$" | stats dc(count) as mycount by user | stats count | table count Total Dashboard Instantiations | search dashboard="$mydashboard$" app="$myapp$" user="$myuser$" | stats count | table count Distinct Dashboards used by App | search dashboard="$mydashboard$" app="$myapp$" user="$myuser$" | stats dc(dashboard) as dashcount by app | table app dashcount | sort - dashcount
Dashboards by instantiation | search dashboard="$mydashboard$" app="$myapp$" user="$myuser$" | stats count by dashboard app | sort - count
Dashboards Instantiations by User/dashboard | search user="$myuser$" app="$myapp$" dashboard="$mydashboard$" | stats count by user dashboard app | join user [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=* | rename title as user] | table user realname dashboard app count | sort - count
Dashboard instantiations over time | search user="$myuser$" app="$myapp$" dashboard="$mydashboard$" | timechart count by dashboard limit=0
result.label: GRN - Dashboard usage
result.title: grn__dashboard_useage

result.author: admin
result.description: Search for a string across Everything
result.eai:data:
Search for a string across Everything
ALL * * app app | rest /services/apps/local splunk_server=local | search disabled=0 | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as *, title as app | table app -24h@h now
Saved Search Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | regex search="(?i)$mystring$" | fields - action*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | eval is_alert=if((((alert_comparator != "") AND (alert_threshold != "")) AND (alert_type != "always")),1,0), has_report_action=if((actions != ""),1,0) | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, is_scheduled, disabled, cron_schedule, is_alert, updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Dashboard Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex data="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,label,sharing ,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app label | stats count by app -24h@h now
Macro Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex definition="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Data Model Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex description="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled,updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Found "$mystring$" in Saved Searches | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | regex search="(?i)$mystring$" | fields - action*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | eval is_alert=if((((alert_comparator != "") AND (alert_threshold != "")) AND (alert_type != "always")),1,0), has_report_action=if((actions != ""),1,0) | rename title as search | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [ | rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | eval author=title ] | table app, author,realname, search,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, is_scheduled, disabled, cron_schedule, is_alert, updated | sort app title -24h@h now
Found "$mystring$" in Dashboards | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex data="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as Dashboard | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author,realname, Dashboard,label,sharing ,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app label -24h@h now https://splunk.kmhp.com/en-US/app/$row.app$/$row.title$
Found "$mystring$" in Macros | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex definition="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as Macro | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author,realname, Macro,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app title -24h@h now https://splunk.kmhp.com//en-US/manager/$row.app$/data/macros/$row.title$?action=edit
Found "$mystring$" in Data Models | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex description="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as DataModel | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author, realname, DataModel,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled,updated | sort app title -24h@h now
result.label: GRN - Inventory
result.title: grn__inventory

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
-7d@d now
Indexed Volume (host=* NOT host=sh*.*splunk*.* index=_telemetry source=*license_usage_summary.log* type="RolloverSummary") | bin _time span=1d | stats latest(b) AS b by slave, pool, _time | timechart span=1d sum(b) AS "volume" fixedrange=true | eval GB=round((((volume / 1024) / 1024) / 1024),3) | fields - b, volume -7d@d @d Missing Sourcetypes | metadata type=sourcetypes | search sourcetype!="*-too_small" | where recentTime < now() - 86400 AND recentTime > now() - 432000 AND sourcetype!="%-too_small" | sort - recentTime | convert ctime(*Time) $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
TcpInputProc Errors index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd log_level!=INFO component=TcpInputProc | timechart count by host $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$ 1 DsBind Errors index=_internal "dsbind failed" | timechart count by host $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$ 1 Indexer Disk Usage TimeChart
 Backup Report earliest=-1d@d+17h index=admin sourcetype=linux:backup | rex field=_raw "backup_start=(?<backup_start>.*)" | rex field=_raw "backup_end=(?<backup_end>.*)" | eval backup_length = round(backup_length/60,0) | transaction host startswith="backup_start" endswith="backup_length" | table host, backup_source, backup_start, backup_end, backup_length | sort host -4h@m now
Uptime | rest /services/server/info | eval LastStartupTime=strftime(startup_time, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S") | eval timenow=now() | eval daysup = round((timenow - startup_time) / 86400,1) | eval Uptime = tostring(daysup) + " Days" | table splunk_server LastStartupTime Uptime | sort splunk_server $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
Largest Indexes index=summary source="daily index size by sourcetype" idx=app-netapp OR idx=windows-security OR idx=firewall OR idx=bro | chart sum(volume_mb) as SizeInGB over yearmonthday by idx | untable yearmonthday SizeInGB idx | xyseries SizeInGB yearmonthday idx -30d@d now App-* Indexes index=summary source="daily index size by sourcetype" idx=app* NOT idx=app-netapp | chart useother=f limit=99 sum(volume_mb) as SizeInGB over yearmonthday by idx | untable yearmonthday SizeInGB idx | xyseries SizeInGB yearmonthday idx -14d@h now Non App-* Indexes index=summary source="daily index size by sourcetype" NOT (idx=app-* OR idx=windows-security OR idx=firewall OR idx=bro) | chart useother=f limit=99 sum(volume_mb) as SizeInGB over yearmonthday by idx | untable yearmonthday SizeInGB idx | xyseries SizeInGB yearmonthday idx -14d@h now Blocked DMZ Traffic index=firewall Deny NOT 10.0.25.61 src=10.0.0.0/8 dest_port=8089 OR dest_port=6450 | localop | lookup dnslookup clientip as src OUTPUTNEW clienthost as src_host | lookup dnslookup clientip as dest OUTPUTNEW clienthost as dest_host | eval dest_host = coalesce(dest_host, dest) | eval src_host = coalesce(src_host, src) | stats count by src, src_host, dest_host, dest_port | where count > 100 $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$ 1
Insufficient Permissions index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd log_level!=INFO NOT serializedxml NOT "xml before signing" insufficient permissions | stats dc(event_message) as numFiles values(event_message) as files by host, component | eval fileSample = mvindex(files,0,3) | fields - files | sort - numFiles $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
Total Daily Volume (host=*.*splunk*.* OR host=phlprlxissspi* OR host=rdgprlxissspi* NOT host=sh*.*splunk*.* index=_telemetry source=*license_usage_summary.log* type="RolloverSummary") | bin _time span=1d | stats latest(b) AS b by slave, pool, _time | timechart span=1d sum(b) as b | eval GB=(((b / 1024) / 1024) / 1024) | fields - b -30d@d now 1 Backlog File Queue Example index=_internal host=cgvprwfcspc003 component=Metrics queue files_queued batchreader* | bin span=10s _time | timechart span=10s sum(current_queue_size) as currentQueue -60m@m now 1 Skipped Searches index=_internal (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.* OR host=plzprlfcsps* OR host=cgvprlfcsps*) sourcetype=scheduler status="skipped" search_type!="*acceleration" | table _time, host,savedsearch_name, user, app, reason | sort -_time $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
Skipped Searches Timeline index=_internal (host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.* OR host=plzprlfcsps* OR host=cgvprlfcsps*) sourcetype=scheduler status="skipped" search_type!="*acceleration" | timechart span=1h count by savedsearch_name $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$ Message Not Dispatched message channel=tenantService/handshake index=_internal "Message not dispatched" sourcetype=splunkd channel="tenantService/handshake" | rex field=sender "connection_(?<sendingIP>.*?)_" | rex field=sender "8089_(?<srcHost>.*?)_" | rex field=event_message "channel=tenantService/handshake (?<Message>.*)" | stats count, values(srcDNSName) AS srcDNSName, earliest(_time) AS Earliest, latest(_time) AS Latest, values(Message) by sendingIP, srcHost | localop | lookup dnslookup clientip as sendingIP OUTPUTNEW clienthost as srcDNSName | convert ctime(Earliest) AS Earliest, ctime(Latest) AS Latest $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
Distinct Hosts by Day index=_internal "Message not dispatched" sourcetype=splunkd channel="tenantService/handshake" | rex field=sender "connection_(?<sendingIP>.*?)_" | rex field=sender "8089_(?<srcHost>.*?)_" | lookup dnslookup clientip as sendingIP OUTPUTNEW clienthost as srcDNSName | timechart span=1d dc(srcHost) $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$ Message Not Dispatched message channel=deploymentServer/phoneHome/default index=_internal "Message not dispatched" sourcetype=splunkd channel="deploymentServer/phoneHome/default" | rex field=sender "connection_(?<sendingIP>.*?)_" | rex field=sender "8089_(?<srcHost>.*?)_" | rex field=event_message "channel=deploymentServer/phoneHome/default (?<Message>.*)" | stats count, values(srcDNSName) AS srcDNSName, earliest(_time) AS Earliest, latest(_time) AS Latest, values(Message) by sendingIP, srcHost | localop | lookup dnslookup clientip as sendingIP OUTPUTNEW clienthost as srcDNSName | convert ctime(Earliest) AS Earliest, ctime(Latest) AS Latest $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
Distinct Hosts by Day index=_internal "Message not dispatched" sourcetype=splunkd channel="deploymentServer/phoneHome/default" | rex field=sender "connection_(?<sendingIP>.*?)_" | rex field=sender "8089_(?<srcHost>.*?)_" | lookup dnslookup clientip as sendingIP OUTPUTNEW clienthost as srcDNSName | timechart span=1d dc(srcHost) $timeChooser.earliest$ $timeChooser.latest$
result.label: GRN - Splunk Health
result.title: grn__splunk_health

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
. . -24h@h now
Search History Searches performed by dashboards will appear in search history index=_audit user=$username$ $kString$ action=search info=granted search=* NOT "search_id='scheduler" NOT "search='|history" NOT "user=splunk-system-user" NOT "search='typeahead" NOT "search='| metadata type=* | search totalCount>0" | table _time, search, user | sort -_time | convert ctime(_time) $tSpan.earliest$ $tSpan.latest$ 1
result.label: GRN - Splunk Search Finder
result.title: grn__splunk_search_finder

result.author: admin
result.description: Search for a string across Everything
result.eai:data:
Search for a string across Everything
ALL * * app app | rest /services/apps/local splunk_server=local | search disabled=0 | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as *, title as app | table app -24h@h now
Saved Search Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | regex search="(?i)$mystring$" | fields - action*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | eval is_alert=if((((alert_comparator != "") AND (alert_threshold != "")) AND (alert_type != "always")),1,0), has_report_action=if((actions != ""),1,0) | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, is_scheduled, disabled, cron_schedule, is_alert, updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Dashboard Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex data="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,label,sharing ,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app label | stats count by app -24h@h now
Macro Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex definition="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Data Model Summary | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="$myApp$" | regex description="(?i)$mystring$" | table app, author,title,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled,updated | sort app title | stats count by app -24h@h now
Found "$mystring$" in Saved Searches | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | regex search="(?i)$mystring$" | fields - action*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | eval is_alert=if((((alert_comparator != "") AND (alert_threshold != "")) AND (alert_type != "always")),1,0), has_report_action=if((actions != ""),1,0) | rename title as search | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [ | rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | eval author=title ] | table app, author,realname, search,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, is_scheduled, disabled, cron_schedule, is_alert, updated | sort app title -24h@h now
Found "$mystring$" in Dashboards | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex data="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as Dashboard | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author,realname, Dashboard,label,sharing ,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app label -24h@h now https://splunk.kmhp.com/en-US/app/$row.app$/$row.title$
Found "$mystring$" in Macros | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/admin/macros | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex definition="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as Macro | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author,realname, Macro,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled, updated | sort app title -24h@h now https://splunk.kmhp.com//en-US/manager/$row.app$/data/macros/$row.title$?action=edit
Found "$mystring$" in Data Models | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields - action*,alert*,auto*,display* | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app="*" | regex description="(?i)$mystring$" | rename title as DataModel | eval author=if(author=="nobody","admin",author) | join author [| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | rename title as author] | table app, author, realname, DataModel,sharing,owner, perms.read, perms.write, disabled,updated | sort app title -24h@h now
result.label: GRN - String Search
result.title: grn__string_search

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
<form>
	<label>K-line (K) Analysis</label>
	
	<fieldset autoRun="true" >
		<input type="text" token="mysymbol">
			<label>Enter Your Stock Symbol (ex: msft, intc):</label>
			<default>bac</default>
			<seed>bac</seed>
		</input>
		<input type="dropdown" token="myrange">
			<label>Time Range:</label>
			<populatingSearch fieldForValue="timerangeday" fieldForLabel="timerangename">iindex=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="5 Days" | eval timerangeday=5 | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="10 Days" | eval timerangeday=10] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="20 Days" | eval timerangeday=20] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="30 Days" | eval timerangeday=30] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="60 Days" | eval timerangeday=60] | fields + timerangename, timerangeday | fields timerangename, timerangeday</populatingSearch>
			<default>60 Days</default>
		</input>
	</fieldset>	
	
	<row>
		<single>
			<searchString>sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head 1 | `LOOKUP` | fields symbol_name</searchString>
		</single>
	</row>
	
	<row>
		<chart>
			<title></title>
			<searchTemplate>sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | eval positive_base=if(close-open>0,open,0) | eval positive_difference=if(close-open>0,close-open,0) | eval negative_base=if(close-open>0,0,close) | eval negative_difference=if(close-open>0,0,open-close) | fields _time, open, close, positive_base, positive_difference, negative_base, negative_difference | head $myrange$ | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | `MA-5Days` | `MA-10Days` | `MA-20Days` | `MA-30Days` | `MA-12Weeks` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, open, close, MA-5Days, MA-10Days, MA-20Days, MA-30Days, MA-12Weeks] | fields _time, positive_base, positive_difference, negative_base, negative_difference, MA-5Days, MA-10Days, MA-20Days, MA-30Days, MA-12Weeks</searchTemplate>

			<option name="height">600px</option>
			
			<option name="charting.seriesColors">[0xFFFFFF,0xFF0000,0xFFFFFF,0x000000,0x0000FF,0x00FF00,0xFF8040,0x00FFFF,0xFFFF00]</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.charts">[@chart,@chart2]</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.axisLabels">[@axisLabelsX,@axisLabelsY,@axisLabelsY2]</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.axisTitles">[@axisTitleX,@axisTitleY,@axisTitleY2]</option>

			<option name="charting.data1">view</option>
			<option name="charting.data1.table">@data</option>
			<option name="charting.data1.columns">[0,1:4]</option>	
			<option name="charting.data2">view</option>			
			<option name="charting.data2.table">@data</option>
			<option name="charting.data2.columns">[0,5:9]</option>
			
			<option name="charting.chart">column</option>
			<option name="charting.chart.data">@data1</option>
			<option name="charting.chart.nullValueMode">connect</option>
			<option name="charting.chart.stackMode">stacked</option>
			<option name="charting.chart2">line</option>
			<option name="charting.chart2.data">@data2</option>
			<option name="charting.chart2.axisY">@axisY2</option>			
			
			<option name="charting.axisY2">#axisY</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleX.text"></option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY.text">price</option>	
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY2">axisTitle</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY2.text"></option>
			
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2">#axisLabelsY</option>
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2.axis">@axisY2</option>
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2.placement">right</option>
		</chart>
	</row>
	<row>
		<chart>
			<title></title>
			<searchTemplate>sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head $myrange$ | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head $myrange$ | stats min(volume) as min_volume] | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head $myrange$ | stats range(volume) as range_volume] | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head $myrange$ | stats max(close) as max_close] | eval normalized_volume = ((volume-min_volume)*max_close)/range_volume | fields _time, close, normalized_volume | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | `MA-5Days` | `MA-10Days` | `MA-20Days` | `MA-30Days` | `MA-12Weeks` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, open, close, MA-5Days, MA-10Days, MA-20Days, MA-30Days, MA-12Weeks] | rename MA-5Days as MA-5Day, MA-10Days as MA-10Day, MA-20Days as MA-20Day, MA-30Days as MA-30Day, MA-12Weeks as MA-12Week | fields _time, normalized_volume, close, MA-5Day, MA-10Day, MA-20Day, MA-30Day, MA-12Week
			</searchTemplate>
			
			<option name="height">400px</option>
			
			<option name="charting.seriesColors">[0xFFFFFF,0x000000,0x0000FF,0x00FF00,0xFF8040,0x00FFFF,0xFFFF00]</option>
			<option name="charting.chart2">line</option>
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2">#axisLabelsY</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.axisLabels">[@axisLabelsX,@axisLabelsY,@axisLabelsY2]</option>
			<option name="charting.chart.data">@data1</option>
			<option name="charting.axisY2">#axisY</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY.text">normalized_volume</option>
			<option name="charting.data2.columns">[0,2:7]</option>
			<option name="charting.data2.table">@data</option>
			<option name="charting.data1.table">@data</option>
			<option name="charting.chart.nullValueMode">connect</option>
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2.axis">@axisY2</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY2">axisTitle</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleY2.text"></option>
			<option name="charting.chart2.axisY">@axisY2</option>
			<option name="charting.data1">view</option>
			<option name="charting.data2">view</option>
			<option name="charting.axisLabelsY2.placement">right</option>
			<option name="charting.data1.columns">[0,1]</option>
			<option name="charting.chart">column</option>
			<option name="charting.seriesColors">[0x000000,0xFF0000]</option>
			<option name="charting.axisTitleX.text">time</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.charts">[@chart,@chart2]</option>
			<option name="charting.layout.axisTitles">[@axisTitleX,@axisTitleY,@axisTitleY2]</option>
			<option name="charting.chart2.data">@data2</option>
		</chart>
	</row>
</form>
result.label: K-line (K) Analysis
result.title: K-line_Analysis

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
<view autoCancelInterval="90" isVisible="true" objectMode="SimpleForm" onunloadCancelJobs="true" template="dashboard.html">
	<label>Market Movers</label>
	<module name="AccountBar" layoutPanel="appHeader"/>
	<module name="AppBar" layoutPanel="navigationHeader"/>
	<module name="Message" layoutPanel="messaging">
		<param name="filter">*</param>
		<param name="clearOnJobDispatch">False</param>
		<param name="maxSize">1</param>
	</module>
	<module name="Message" layoutPanel="messaging">
		<param name="filter">splunk.search.job</param>
		<param name="clearOnJobDispatch">True</param>
		<param name="maxSize">1</param>
	</module>
	<module name="TitleBar" layoutPanel="viewHeader">
		<param name="actionsMenuFilter">dashboard</param>
	</module>
	
	<module name="SearchSelectLister" layoutPanel="viewHeader"  autoRun="True">
		<param name="staticFieldsToDisplay"/>
		<param name="search">index=_internal | head 1 | eval searchname = "Price % Gainers" | eval searchstring = "sourcetype=trainingstock | stats first(low) as low, first(high) as high, first(open) as open, first(close) as close, first(volume) as volume by symbol, symbol_name | eval change = (close-open)/open*100 | sort by change desc | eval change=change+\"%\" | rename symbol_name as company_name | fields symbol, company_name, low, high, open, close, volume, change" | fields - _time | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval searchname = "Price % Losers" | eval searchstring = "sourcetype=trainingstock | stats first(low) as low, first(high) as high, first(open) as open, first(close) as close, first(volume) as volume  by symbol, symbol_name | eval change = (close-open)/open*100 | sort by change asec | eval change=change+\"%\" | rename symbol_name as company_name | fields symbol, company_name, low, high, open, close, volume, change" | fields - _time] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval searchname = "Most Active" | eval searchstring = "sourcetype=trainingstock | stats first(low) as low, first(high) as high, first(open) as open, first(close) as close, first(volume) as volume  by symbol, symbol_name | eval change = (close-open)/open*100 | sort by volume desc | eval change=change+\"%\" | rename symbol_name as company_name | fields symbol, company_name, low, high, open, close, volume, change" | fields - _time]</param>
		<param name="selected">Price % Gainers</param>
		<param name="settingToCreate">myselection_setting</param>
		<param name="searchFieldsToDisplay">
			<list>
				<param name="value">searchstring</param>
				<param name="label">searchname</param>
			</list>
		</param>
		<param name="searchWhenChanged">False</param>
		<module name="ConvertToIntention">
			<param name="settingToConvert">myselection_setting</param>
			<param name="intention">
				<param name="name">stringreplace</param>
				<param name="arg">
					<param name="myselection">
						<param name="default">Price % Gainers</param>
						<param name="fillOnEmpty">True</param>
						<param name="value">$target$</param>
					</param>
				</param>
			</param>
			
			<module name="SubmitButton">
				<param name="allowSoftSubmit">True</param>
				<param name="label">Search</param>
				<!-- ============================================= -->
				<!-- ============================================= -->
				<module name="HiddenSearch" layoutPanel="panel_row1_col1" group="Market Movers:" autoRun="False">
					<param name="search">$myselection$</param>
					<param name="groupLabel">Market Movers (click on one of the stocks below):</param>
					<module name="ViewstateAdapter">
						<module name="HiddenFieldPicker">
							<param name="strictMode">True</param>
							<module name="Paginator">
								<param name="count">15</param>
								<param name="entityName">events</param>
								<module name="JobProgressIndicator"/>
								
								<module name="SimpleResultsTable">
									<param name="displayRowNumbers">True</param>
									<param name="drilldown">row</param>
									<param name="allowTransformedFieldSelect">True</param>
									<param name="entityName">results</param>

									<module name="ConvertToIntention">
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- 												-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->	
										<param name="intention">
											<param name="name">stringreplace</param>
											<param name="arg">
												<param name="DrillDown_Param">
													<param name="fillOnEmpty">True</param>
													<param name="prefix">"</param>
													<param name="default">$click.value$</param>
													<param name="suffix">"</param>
												</param>
											</param>
										</param>

										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row1_col2										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->				
										<module name="HiddenSearch" layoutPanel="panel_row1_col2" autoRun="False">
											<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | fields symbol_name							
											</param>
											<module name="ViewstateAdapter">
												<module name="HiddenFieldPicker">
													<param name="strictMode">True</param>
													<module name="JobProgressIndicator">
														<module name="SingleValue"/>
													</module>
												</module>
											</module>
										</module>
					
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row1_col2										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->				
										<module name="HiddenSearch">
											<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | `lineartrend(_time,close)` | rename close as price, newY as trend | fields _time, price, trend</param>
											<module layoutPanel="panel_row1_col2" name="SimpleResultsHeader">
												<param name="headerFormat">Company Stock Linear Trendline vs. Daily Closing Price</param>
												<param name="entityName">events</param>
												<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
													<param name="chart">area</param>
													<param name="primaryAxisTitle.text">time</param>
													<param name="secondaryAxisTitle.text">price</param>
													<param name="legend.placement">right</param>
													<module name="FlashChart">
														<param name="width">100%</param>
														<param name="height">300px</param>
													</module>
												</module><!--HiddenChartFormatter-->	
											</module><!--SimpleResultsHeader-->
										</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
					
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col1										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->				
										<module name="HiddenSearch" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col1" group="6-weeks vs. 12-weeks Moving Average Analysis" autoRun="False">
											<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | tail 60 | head 1 | eval Should_Invest_Long_Term = if((close_p30 > close_p60), "Long-term Investment: Recommended", "Long-term Investment: Not Recommended") | fields Should_Invest_Long_Term							
											</param>
											<param name="groupLabel">6-weeks vs. 12-weeks Moving Average Analysis</param>
											<module name="ViewstateAdapter">
												<module name="HiddenFieldPicker">
													<param name="strictMode">True</param>
													<module name="SingleValue"/>
												</module><!--HiddenFieldPicker-->
											</module><!--ViewstateAdapter-->
										</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
					
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col1										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->	
										<module name="GenericHeader" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col1" autoRun="True">
											<param name="label"> </param>
											
											<module name="HiddenSearch" autoRun="True">
												<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | `MA-6Weeks` | `MA-12Weeks` | fields _time, volume, close, MA-6Weeks, MA-12Weeks | tail 180</param>
											
												<module name="TimeRangePicker">
													<param name="searchWhenChanged">True</param>
													<param name="default">Previous year</param>
													
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.fieldColors">{"close": 0xC0C0C0, "MA-6Weeks": 0x000000, "MA-12Weeks": 0x0000A0}</param>
														<param name="charting.chart">line</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">price</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text"> </param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,2:4]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>
													  
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.chart">column</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">volume</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text">time</param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,1]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>
												
												</module><!--TimeRangePicker-->
											</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
										</module><!--GenericHeader-->

										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col2										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->				
										<module name="HiddenSearch" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col2" group="10-days vs. 30-days Moving Average Analysis" autoRun="False">
											<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-30 | tail 30 | head 1 | eval Should_Invest_Mid_Term = if((close_p10 > close_p30), "Mid-term Investment: Recommended", "Mid-term Investment: Not Recommended") | fields Should_Invest_Mid_Term</param>
											<param name="groupLabel">10-days vs. 30-days Moving Average Analysis</param>
											<module name="ViewstateAdapter">
												<module name="HiddenFieldPicker">
													<param name="strictMode">True</param>
													<module name="JobProgressIndicator">
														<module name="SingleValue"/>
													</module>
												</module><!--HiddenFieldPicker-->
											</module><!--ViewstateAdapter-->
										</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
					
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col2										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->	
										<module name="GenericHeader" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col2" autoRun="True">
											<param name="label"> </param>
											
											<module name="HiddenSearch" autoRun="True">
												<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-30 | `MA-10Days` | `MA-30Days` | fields _time, volume, close, MA-10Days, MA-30Days</param>	
											
												<module name="TimeRangePicker">
													<param name="searchWhenChanged">True</param>
													<param name="default">Previous year</param>
													
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.fieldColors">{"close": 0xC0C0C0, "MA-10Days": 0x000000, "MA-30Days": 0x0000A0}</param>
														<param name="charting.chart">line</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">price</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text"> </param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,2:4]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>
													  
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.chart">line</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">volume</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text">time</param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,1]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>

												</module><!--TimeRangePicker-->
											</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
										</module><!--GenericHeader-->

										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col13									-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->				
										<module name="HiddenSearch" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col3" group="5-days vs. 20-days Moving Average Analysis" autoRun="False">
											<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-20 | tail 20 | head 1 | eval Should_Invest_Short_Term = if((close_p5 > close_p20), "Short-term Investment: Recommended", "Short-term Investment: Not Recommended") | fields Should_Invest_Short_Term</param>
											<param name="groupLabel">5-days vs. 20-days Moving Average Analysis</param>
											<module name="ViewstateAdapter">
												<module name="HiddenFieldPicker">
													<param name="strictMode">True</param>
													<module name="JobProgressIndicator">
														<module name="SingleValue"/>
													</module>
												</module><!--HiddenFieldPicker-->
											</module><!--ViewstateAdapter-->
										</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
					
										<!-- ============================================== -->
										<!-- row2_col3										-->
										<!-- ============================================== -->	
										<module name="GenericHeader" layoutPanel="panel_row2_col3" autoRun="True">
											<param name="label"> </param>
											
											<module name="HiddenSearch" autoRun="True">
												<param name="search">sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$DrillDown_Param$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-20 | `MA-5Days` | `MA-20Days` | fields _time, volume, close, MA-5Days, MA-20Days</param>
													
												<module name="TimeRangePicker">
													<param name="searchWhenChanged">True</param>
													<param name="default">Previous year</param>
													
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.fieldColors">{"close": 0xC0C0C0, "MA-5Days": 0x000000, "MA-20Days": 0x0000A0}</param>
														<param name="charting.chart">line</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">price</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text"> </param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,2:4]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>
													  
													<module name="HiddenChartFormatter">
														<param name="charting.chart">line</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.text">volume</param>
														<param name="charting.secondaryAxisTitle.margin">0</param>
														<param name="charting.primaryAxisTitle.text">time</param>
														<param name="charting.chart.data">@data1</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.columns">[0,1]</param>
														<param name="charting.data1.table">@data</param>
														<param name="charting.data1">view</param>
														<module name="FlashChart">
														  <param name="width">100%</param>
														  <module name="ConvertToDrilldownSearch">
															<module name="ViewRedirector">
															  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
															</module>
														  </module>
														</module>
														<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
														  <param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
														</module>
													</module>
												
												</module><!--TimeRangePicker-->
											</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
										</module><!--GenericHeader-->

									</module><!--ConvertToIntention-->	
								</module><!--SimpleResultsTable-->
								
								<module name="ViewRedirectorLink">
									<param name="viewTarget">flashtimeline</param>
								</module>
							</module><!--Paginator-->
						</module><!--HiddenFieldPicker-->
					</module><!--ViewStateAdapter-->
				</module><!--HiddenSearch-->
			</module><!--SubmitButton-->
		</module><!--ConvertToIntention-->
	</module><!--SearchSelectLister-->
</view>
result.label: Market Movers
result.title: Market_Movers

result.author: admin
result.eai:data:
bac bac index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="1 Month" | eval timerangeday=30 | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="2 Months" | eval timerangeday=60] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="3 Months" | eval timerangeday=90] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="6 Months" | eval timerangeday=180] | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="1 Year" | eval timerangeday=365] | fields + timerangename, timerangeday | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="2 Years" | eval timerangeday=730] | fields + timerangename, timerangeday | append [search index=_internal | head 1 | eval timerangename="4 Years" | eval timerangeday=1460] | fields + timerangename, timerangeday 6 Months
sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head 1 | `LOOKUP` | fields symbol_name Company Profilesourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head 1 | eval temp=(close-open)/open*100 | eval Change = temp + "%" | eval DayRange = low + " ~ " + high | join type=left[search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | head 2 | reverse | head 1 | rename close as PreviousClose | fields PreviousClose] | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(_time) | rename _time as LastTradeTime, open as Open, close as LastTrade, volume as Volume | table symbol, symbol_name, LastTradeTime, LastTrade, Change, PreviousClose, Open, DayRange, Volume | join type=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | tail 60 | head 1 | eval Should_Invest_Long_Term = if((close_p30 > close_p60), "Recommended", "Not Recommended") | eval Should_Invest_Mid_Term = if((close_p10 > close_p30), "Recommended", "Not Recommended") | eval Should_Invest_Short_Term = if((close_p5 > close_p20), "Recommended", "Not Recommended") | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(_time) | rename _time as LastTradeTime | table symbol, LastTradeTime, Should_Invest_Long_Term, Should_Invest_Mid_Term, Should_Invest_Short_Term] | transpose | where column != "symbol" | where column != "symbol_name" | where column != "_timediff"
Long Term Investment: 6-weeks vs. 12-weeks moving average sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-30 | `MA-6Weeks` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-6Weeks | join TYPE=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-60 | `MA-12Weeks` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-12Weeks] | rename close as close(l) | rename volume as volume(l) | fields _time, close(l), MA-6Weeks, MA-12Weeks, volume(l) Mid Term Investment: 10-days vs. 30-days moving average sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-10 | `MA-10Days` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-10Days | join TYPE=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-30 | `MA-30Days` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-30Days] | rename close as close(m) | rename volume as volume(m)| fields _time, close(m), MA-10Days, MA-30Days, volume(m) Short Term Investment: 5-days vs. 20-days moving average sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-5 | `MA-5Days` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-5Days | join TYPE=left [search sourcetype=trainingstock symbol=$mysymbol$ | reverse | autoregress close p=1-20 | `MA-20Days` | tail $myrange$ | fields _time, volume, close, MA-20Days] | rename close as close(s) | rename volume as volume(s) | fields _time, close(s), MA-5Days, MA-20Days, volume(s)
result.label: Moving Average (MA) Analysis
result.title: Moving_Average_Analysis

result.author: admin
result.search:
| makeresults format=csv data="app, target, uri
neusse_master, data/ui/views, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/ui/views
neusse_master, saved/searches, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/saved/searches
neusse_master, configs/conf-inputs, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-inputs
neusse_master, configs/conf-lookups, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-lookups
neusse_master, admin/macros, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/admin/macros
neusse_master, datamodel/model, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/datamodel/model
neusse_master, saved/eventtypes, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/saved/eventtypes
neusse_master, configs/conf-tags, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-tags
neusse_master, data/ui/panels, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/ui/panels
neusse_master, configs/conf-commands, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-commands
neusse_master, storage/collections/config, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/storage/collections/config
neusse_master, data/ui/nav, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/ui/nav
neusse_master, data/props/calcfields, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/props/calcfields
neusse_master, data/props/extractions, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/props/extractions
neusse_master, data/props/fieldaliases, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/props/fieldaliases
neusse_master, data/props/lookups, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/props/lookups
neusse_master, data/props/sourcetype-rename, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/props/sourcetype-rename
neusse_master, data/transforms/extractions, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/transforms/extractions
neusse_master, data/transforms/lookups, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/transforms/lookups
neusse_master, data/transforms/metric-schema, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/transforms/metric-schema
neusse_master, data/transforms/statsdextractions, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/data/transforms/statsdextractions
neusse_master, configs/conf-times, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-times
neusse_master, configs/conf-viewstates, /servicesNS/-/neusse_master/configs/conf-viewstates"
| map maxsearches=100 search="| rest splunk_server=local $uri$ count=0 search=eai:acl.app=$app$  | eval target=$target$"
| fields - display* auto_* _raw id 'eai:digest' qualifiedSearch next_scheduled_time durable*
result.title: Backup ALL KO's got george_master

result.author: nobody
result.eai:data:
<nav search_view="search">
  <view name="search" default='true' />
